si.title: මාතර වෙඩි තැබීම: එක් අයෙකු මිය ගියේය
body_lines: மாத்தறை - ருவன்வெல்ல பகுதியில் முச்சக்கரவண்டியில் பயணித்துக் கொண்டிருந்த ஒருவர் துப்பாக்கிச் சூட்டுக்கு இலக்காகி உயிரிழந்தார்.
ඊයේ සවස වෙඩි තැබීමට වෙඩි තැබූ මෝටර් රථයට පැමිණි නාඳුනන තුවක්කුකරුවන් පැවසුවේ පොලිස් මාධ්ය ඒකකය පොලිස් මාධ්ය ඒකකය පවසයි.
මියගිය පුද්ගලයා මාතර - කොටුවේ සිට 53 හැවිරිදි-වෝල්ඩ් ලෙස හඳුනාගෙන තිබේ.(අ)

en.title: Matara firing: One killed
body_lines: A man who was traveling in a three -wheeler in the Matara - Ruwanwella area was shot dead.
Unidentified gunmen who came in the car fired at the shooting yesterday evening, police media unit said.
The deceased has been identified as a 53 -year -old from Matara - Fort.(a)

summary_lines: Here's a summary of the text in approximately 200 characters:

Gunmen in a car fatally shot a 53-year-old man riding a three-wheeler in Matara-Ruwanwella. The incident occurred last night. Police have not yet released further details about the unidentified attackers.
